member.name: P:Xbim.IO.CobieExpress.CobieModel.ModelProvider
member.summary: Provides access to model persistance capabilities

member.name: P:Xbim.IO.CobieExpress.CobieModel.ModelProviderFactory
member.remarks: Consumers can use this instance of to control the implementations of IModel it uses. In particular you can tell the factory to always use MemoryModel, or Esent model, or a blend (Heuristic)

member.name: M:Xbim.IO.CobieExpress.CobieModel.OpenStep21(System.IO.Stream,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: This factory only opens an in memory model
